org.apache.solr.util

Interface SolrCLI.Tool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SolrCLI.ApiTool, SolrCLI.ConfigTool, SolrCLI.CreateCollectionTool, SolrCLI.CreateCoreTool, SolrCLI.CreateTool, SolrCLI.DeleteTool, SolrCLI.HealthcheckTool, SolrCLI.RunExampleTool, SolrCLI.SolrCloudTool, SolrCLI.StatusTool, SolrCLI.ToolBase
    Enclosing class:
    SolrCLI

    public static interface SolrCLI.Tool
    Defines the interface to a Solr tool that can be run from this command-line app.
